body_html:
Found a solution. Removed ANDROID_TYPES from CXXFLAGS
However, for some reason I get Bus Error when compiling with neon-vfpv4 Raspberry Pi 3 on Gentoo with GCC 5.4.0-r4
Guess, that's a cross compiler issue.
Closing.

body:
Found a solution. Removed ANDROID_TYPES from CXXFLAGS 
However, for some reason I get Bus Error when compiling with neon-vfpv4 Raspberry Pi 3 on Gentoo with GCC 5.4.0-r4
Guess, that's a cross compiler issue.
Closing.
